publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3104# Ms Sandra White: Community Police Officersâ€”That the Parliament recognises the extremely effective role played by community police officers in combating crime, particularly youth crime; notes that such officers are often the most visible and recognisable police presence in their communities and recognises the crucial role that they play in providing high quality policing and fostering links with the communities they serve; regrets that these officers are often removed from their vital community role to perform other police duties, and therefore believes that the Scottish Executive should encourage community policing and provide the necessary resources to ensure the provision of adequate numbers of community police officers.
S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) Michael Matheson*
S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Robert Brown*

S1M-3104# Ms Sandra White: Community Police Officers-That the Parliament recognises the extremely effective role played by community police officers in combating crime, particularly youth crime; notes that such officers are often the most visible and recognisable police presence in their communities and recognises the crucial role that they play in providing high quality policing and fostering links with the communities they serve; regrets that these officers are often removed from their vital community role to perform other police duties, and therefore believes that the Scottish Executive should encourage community policing and provide the necessary resources to ensure the provision of adequate numbers of community police officers. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Robert Brown
S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) Shona Robison*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Andrew Wilson*, Alex Neil*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Brian Adam*, Stewart Stevenson*, Margaret Smith*
S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) Michael Russell*
S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) John Young*
S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) Colin Campbell*
S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) Fergus Ewing*
S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-3104# Community Police Officers (lodged on 14 May 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
